5.text: Now find rhyming words to these from the words given above. e.g. :- blunder - wonder • term • tall • perk • sword • herd • ponder

9.text: All over the world there are stories about brave children. This story of Hans who saved his city from flooding is one such story.

11.text: Before writing the story, let's arrange the facts. Look at the pictures and write the relevant words/ phrases from the table under each picture.
